title: russelbrok
author: russelbrok
content: Hi everybodyI can Buy anything for you from these Marketplaces and you can pay me in CryptoAmazonWalmarteBayWishAlibabathe limit 10K $send to all over the world almost (shipment on you) The reason behind all that to had BTC\ETH\USDT with no FEES + i want to invest in crypto but i wont Buy crypto with my credit card ..prefer to invest discreetly  For more details dm in telegram : @ticketmaster12

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: russelbrok on September 02, 2022, 07:56:20 PMHi everybodyI can Buy anything for you from these Marketplaces and you can pay me in CryptoAmazonWalmarteBayWishAlibabathe limit 10K $send to all over the world almost (shipment on you) The reason behind all that to had BTC\ETH\USDT with no FEES + i want to invest in crypto but i wont Buy crypto with my credit card ..prefer to invest discreetly  For more details dm in telegram : @ticketmaster12You are going to have to offer using an escrow here on this site if you want tonpull this off, or you will have to send first.  No one is going to send you crypto first in hopes that you ship them something.  You willing to use escrow?  If so I'd put that in your opinion as well.

comments.author: eckobaba
comments.body: Do u accept escrow? And what are your rates?

comments.author: russelbrok
comments.body: Quote from: eckobaba on September 06, 2022, 12:01:35 AMDo u accept escrow? And what are your rates?yes i accept escrow , 3% of the order , shipment on you

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Have you checked out purse.io?  It's a great site that I've used for years and allows you to buy people's wish list in exchange for crypto.  There's usually a discount though of around 10%.  I've used it mostly to buy things off amazon with a discount.  There are times when I've gotten as much as a 30% discount on items. Worth looking into...  Maybe not so much if you're trying to buy the wish lists, since there is a discount, but worth checking into if you're into this.

comments.author: russelbrok
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 08, 2022, 06:30:43 PMHave you checked out purse.io?  It's a great site that I've used for years and allows you to buy people's wish list in exchange for crypto.  There's usually a discount though of around 10%.  I've used it mostly to buy things off amazon with a discount.  There are times when I've gotten as much as a 30% discount on items. Worth looking into...  Maybe not so much if you're trying to buy the wish lists, since there is a discount, but worth checking into if you're into this.yeah Im aware of it , i just wanted a cheap way to get crypto + Discreet ( not using credit cards to buy crypto)
